hero.description: Professional cleaning for office buildings, apartment complexes, and post-construction at the highest quality.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional cleaning solutions for every need

office.title: Office Building Cleaning
office.description: We tackle our daily tasks with greater momentum at work when greeted by a pristine, organized space. Our professional office cleaning service ensures your employees always work in an inspiring, healthy environment.
office.infoTitle: How often should an office building be cleaned?
office.infoText: The cleaning frequency of an office building can vary depending on factors such as building size, number of employees, and nature of work performed. Generally, common areas and high-traffic zones should be cleaned daily, while individual offices and less frequently used spaces can be cleaned weekly or bi-weekly.

residential.title: Apartment Building Cleaning
residential.description: The apartment building is a shared area where we share space with our neighbors. With our regular cleaning, we ensure that the stairwell, elevator, and common areas always remain clean and presentable - also increasing the property value.
features: Entrance door and glass surface cleaning
residential.infoTitle: Apartment building cleaning comes in handy when:
residential.infoText: The stairwell shows traces of pets, marks remain after neighbors' renovation work, or you simply want your home's common areas to always be presentable and clean.

construction.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
construction.description: If you want perfect results, entrust the professional removal of drips, adhesive residue, dust, and other contaminants after construction, renovation, or painting to our company. With our industrial machines and special cleaning agents, we guarantee immaculate results.
construction.infoText: Construction can leave behind mess that requires thorough cleaning. We ensure that newly built or renovated properties are immaculate and ready for move-in.

deep.title: Deep Home Cleaning
deep.description: From time to time, we all need a thorough deep cleaning, which we perform at a professional level. Whether it's pre/post-move cleaning or simply a deep clean - we're here to help!
features: Kitchen appliance deep cleaning (oven, fridge, microwave)
deep.infoTitle: When should you order a deep cleaning?
deep.infoText: Before/after moving, at seasonal changes, before major events, or if you simply want your home to shine again. We recommend at least 2-4 times per year.

pricing.title: Our Prices
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing, no hidden costs

basic.name: Basic Apartment
basic.description: For regular cleaning of smaller apartment buildings

premium.name: Premium Apartment
premium.description: For comprehensive cleaning of larger apartment buildings

pricing.disclaimer: * Prices are indicative. For an accurate quote, please contact us. We provide free on-site assessment.

mission.title: Our Mission is Cleanliness
mission.p1: KaDa Cleaning was founded in January 2025 with the goal of providing professional cleaning services to individuals and businesses alike in Szeged and its surroundings.
mission.p2: Every member of our experienced team has undergone thorough training and is committed to performing every job at the highest standard.
mission.p3: We are proud to exclusively use eco-friendly, hypoallergenic cleaning products that are safe for your family and pets.
mission.p4: We believe that a clean environment is not a luxury, but a basic necessity - and we help you achieve it.

team.title: Experienced Team
team.description: All our staff have undergone thorough training and possess the necessary professional experience. We continuously develop our knowledge in new cleaning technologies.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly Solutions
eco.description: We exclusively use eco-friendly, hypoallergenic cleaning products that are safe for children and pets while effectively removing contaminants.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.description: If you're not satisfied with our work, we'll return and re-clean free of charge. Customer satisfaction comes first - we guarantee this with every order.

flexible.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexible.description: We adapt to your schedule - whether it's morning, evening, or weekend cleaning. With our online booking system, you can easily select the time that suits you.

insured.title: Insured Service
insured.description: We have comprehensive liability insurance, so you can rest easy. Our staff are reliable and discreet - your home is safe with us.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Have questions? Our customer service is available weekdays 8:00-18:00. We're at your service with quick response times and personalized solutions.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say about us

1.name: Peter Kovács
1.content: Since we've been working with KaDa Cleaning, the residents are satisfied, and the stairwell is always clean and tidy. Reliable and flexible - I can only recommend them!

2.name: Eszter Nagy
2.content: We entrusted our office cleaning to them and weren't disappointed. They do precise work and always arrive on time. The employees also noticed the difference!

3.name: János Szabó
3.content: We called them for deep cleaning after renovation. They did incredible work - they removed construction dust from places we wouldn't have thought of.

4.name: Mária Tóth
4.content: We order deep cleaning twice a year. They use eco-friendly products, which is important to us because of the children and dog. Excellent quality!

5.name: Gábor Horváth
5.content: I call KaDa Cleaning before every handover. They're fast, thorough, and my clients are always satisfied with the result. Professional team!

6.name: Katalin Varga
6.content: I rent out multiple apartments, and I can always count on KaDa Cleaning for turnover cleaning between guests. Flexible and reliable.

cta.title: Interested in our services?
cta.description: Contact us and request a free quote! We serve Szeged and a 30 km radius.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions
faq.notFound: Didn't find the answer to your question?

1.question: How often is apartment building cleaning recommended?
1.answer: The cleaning frequency is determined by the building size, number of residents, and traffic. We generally recommend 1-2 times per week, but larger buildings may require daily cleaning. During the initial consultation, we assess your needs and prepare a personalized quote.

2.question: What cleaning products do you use?
2.answer: We exclusively use professional, eco-friendly, and hypoallergenic cleaning products that are safe for children and pets. All our products have the necessary quality certifications.

3.question: How much does the cleaning service cost?
3.answer: The price depends on several factors: the size of the area to be cleaned, the type and frequency of cleaning, and any special requirements. We offer free on-site assessment and personalized quotes.

4.question: Do you guarantee your work?
4.answer: Yes! We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee on all our work. If you're not satisfied with the result, we'll return and re-clean free of charge. We also have comprehensive liability insurance.

5.question: How does booking and payment work?
5.answer: Booking can be done by phone, email, or through our website. We perform a free on-site assessment for first-time clients. Payment can be made in cash or by bank transfer after the work is completed. We also offer monthly billing for regular orders.

6.question: Do you work on weekends or holidays?
6.answer: Yes, we adapt to our clients' needs. We also undertake weekend and holiday cleaning by prior arrangement. For office buildings, we often perform cleaning outside working hours to avoid disrupting work.

7.question: What happens if I'm not home during cleaning?
7.answer: Our regular clients often entrust us with keys. All our staff have undergone background checks and reliability assessments. We store keys securely and handle them according to strict protocols.

8.question: Do you undertake special cleaning tasks?
8.answer: Yes! In addition to standard cleaning, we offer window cleaning, carpet cleaning, upholstery cleaning, deep limescale removal, and other special tasks. Request our custom quote!

sidebar.title: Get in Touch!
sidebar.description: Fill out the form and we'll contact you soon. Quality comes first for us, and our goal is a 100% satisfied customer!

form.title: Request Quote
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help...
form.successDescription: Your quote request has been forwarded successfully!

cookie.title: We use cookies
cookie.description: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze site traffic. By clicking "Accept", you consent to the use of cookies.

footer.description: Professional cleaning services for office buildings and apartment complexes.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

floatingButtons.whatsappMessage: Hi! I'm interested in your cleaning services.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: KaDa Cleaning is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your data when using our services.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller is KaDa Cleaning (registered office: Szeged, Hungary). For questions about data processing, contact us at info@kadacleaning.hu.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: Through the contact form, we collect the following data: last name, first name, email address, phone number, and your message. Additionally, we collect anonymous statistical data through cookies during website use.

purpose.title: Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.content: We use your data exclusively for contacting you, responding to quote requests, and fulfilling our services. We do not share your data with third parties for marketing purposes.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: The legal basis for data processing is your consent (GDPR Article 6(1)(a)), which you provide by completing the contact form. You may withdraw your consent at any time.

retention.title: Data Retention Period
retention.content: We retain contact data until the quote request is answered, or in case of contract, for 5 years after the contract ends, in accordance with legal obligations.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

list.access: Right of access: request information about your stored data
list.rectification: Right to rectification: request correction of inaccurate data
list.erasure: Right to erasure: request deletion of your data
list.restriction: Right to restriction: request limitation of data processing
list.portability: Data portability: request transfer of your data
list.objection: Right to object: object to data processing

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience and collect anonymous statistics (Google Analytics). We ask for your consent to use cookies on your first visit. You can modify cookie settings in your browser at any time.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For privacy questions, contact us at: info@kadacleaning.hu. For complaints, you may contact the Hungarian National Authority for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (NAIH): www.naih.hu

privacy.footerNote: This policy is effective from January 1, 2025. We reserve the right to modify this policy and will inform you of changes on our website.

office.metaTitle: Office Building Cleaning in Szeged | KaDa Cleaning

hero.title: Office Building Cleaning
hero.subtitle: Professional office cleaning for a productive work environment

intro.title: Clean Office, Satisfied Employees
intro.p1: A clean, organized work environment is not just an aesthetic matter - it directly affects employee productivity, health, and company image. A hygienic office space reduces the spread of illness and increases workplace satisfaction.
intro.p2: With KaDa Cleaning's professional office cleaning services, we ensure your staff can start each day in a sparkling clean, inspiring environment. Our experienced team works with the latest equipment and eco-friendly cleaning products.

items.title: Daily Regular Cleaning
items.description: Office surface dusting, floor cleaning, emptying bins, general tidying

items.title: Restroom & Kitchen Sanitization

items.title: Machine Floor Cleaning
items.description: Deep cleaning and polishing with industrial machines for all floor types

items.description: Professional machine cleaning of office carpets and carpet floors, stain removal

items.title: Window Cleaning

benefits: After-hours cleaning - no disruption to work
Flexible scheduling to meet your needs

faq.question: How often is office cleaning recommended?
faq.answer: This depends on office size and number of employees. We generally recommend daily or 2-3 times per week for common areas and restrooms, while individual offices can be cleaned weekly.

faq.question: Do you work outside business hours?
faq.answer: Yes, we specifically recommend after-hours cleaning to avoid disrupting office work. We can accommodate early morning, evening, and weekend appointments.

faq.question: Do you bring your own equipment and cleaning products?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide all necessary equipment and professional cleaning products. We exclusively use eco-friendly, hypoallergenic products.

hero.title: Apartment Building Cleaning

intro.title: Presentable Common Areas
intro.p1: An apartment building's common areas create the first impression for visitors and potential buyers. Regularly cleaned, well-maintained stairwells and common areas not only provide a more pleasant living environment but also increase property value.
intro.p2: KaDa Cleaning offers comprehensive apartment building cleaning services, including regular maintenance of stairwells, elevators, common areas, and courtyards. Our flexible service packages can meet the needs of any size building.

items.title: Stairwell Cleaning

faq.question: How often should a stairwell be cleaned?
faq.answer: Cleaning frequency depends on the number of residents and traffic. We generally recommend 1-2 times per week, but high-traffic buildings may require daily cleaning.

faq.question: How does payment work?
faq.answer: We work with monthly invoicing, residents can pay as part of common costs. We accept both cash and bank transfer payments.

faq.question: Do you also do one-time cleaning?
faq.answer: Yes, in addition to regular contracts, we also take on one-time jobs, such as after renovations or before special events.

construction.metaTitle: Post-Construction Cleaning in Szeged | KaDa Cleaning
construction.metaDescription: Professional post-construction and renovation cleaning in Szeged. Removal of construction dust, paint spots, adhesive residue. Request a free quote!

intro.title: Professional Post-Construction Cleaning
intro.p1: After construction and renovation, a lot of dust, debris, paint spots, and adhesive residue remains, which requires special knowledge and equipment to remove. Regular cleaning cannot achieve the perfect results that a new or renovated property deserves.
intro.p2: With KaDa Cleaning's industrial machines and special cleaning agents, we guarantee that your property will be immaculately clean for move-in or handover. Our experienced team effectively removes all types of post-construction contamination.

items.title: Construction Dust Removal
items.description: Removal of fine cement and plaster dust from all surfaces, including hard-to-reach areas

items.title: Paint Spot Cleaning
items.description: Safe removal of paint drips and splatters from windows, floors, tiles

items.title: Adhesive Residue
items.description: Removal of tile adhesive, silicone, foam, and other construction material residues

items.title: Window Deep Cleaning
items.description: Removal of construction dust and film, frame cleaning, sill dusting

items.title: Machine Floor Cleaning
items.description: Machine deep cleaning and polishing of tile, hardwood, laminate floors

items.title: Sanitaryware Polishing
items.description: Thorough cleaning and polishing of toilets, sinks, faucets, shower cabins

benefits: Industrial machines and special cleaning agents
Appropriate technology for all surface types

steps.title: Assessment
steps.description: We assess the work based on construction type and contamination level

steps.title: Quote
steps.description: Per-square-meter or fixed-price quote according to your needs

steps.title: Deep Cleaning
steps.description: Professional, thorough cleaning in every room

steps.title: Quality Check
steps.description: Final inspection before handover, corrections if needed

faq.question: When can cleaning begin?
faq.answer: After construction work is fully complete, when paint and adhesives have dried. We generally recommend 24-48 hours after work completion.

faq.question: How long does post-renovation cleaning take?
faq.answer: This depends on the property size and level of contamination. For an average apartment, 4-8 hours; for larger areas, it may take 1-2 days.

faq.question: What if something isn't perfect?
faq.answer: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you find any deficiency, we'll return and correct it free of charge.

deep.metaTitle: Deep Home Cleaning in Szeged | KaDa Cleaning
deep.metaDescription: Professional deep home cleaning in Szeged. Pre/post-move, spring cleaning. Deep cleaning, sanitization. Request a quote!

intro.title: When Regular Cleaning Isn't Enough
intro.p1: During everyday cleaning, many areas get missed: areas behind furniture, hard-to-reach corners, the inside of kitchen appliances. Over time, dust, grease, and dirt accumulate in these places, which can cause allergens and unpleasant odors.
intro.p2: With KaDa Cleaning's deep cleaning service, we clean every corner. With our professional equipment and methods, we perform such thorough cleaning that your home will sparkle again. Ideal before/after moving, at seasonal changes, or whenever deep cleaning is needed.

items.title: Kitchen Deep Clean
items.description: Interior and exterior cleaning of oven, fridge, microwave, range hood, degreasing

items.title: Thorough Bathroom Cleaning
items.description: Limescale removal, mold removal, grout cleaning, sanitizer disinfection

items.title: Windows & Blinds
items.description: Interior-exterior window cleaning, blinds, shutters, screen dusting

items.title: Behind & Under Furniture
items.description: Moving furniture (where possible), thorough cleaning behind and under them

items.title: Textile Refreshing
items.description: Upholstery, curtain, mattress dusting and refreshing

items.title: Lights & Decor
items.description: Chandelier, lamp, picture frame, decorative item dusting

benefits: We clean every corner that daily cleaning misses
Hypoallergenic products safe for allergy sufferers

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We assess home size and special needs

steps.title: Deep Cleaning
steps.description: Thorough, methodical cleaning in every room

steps.title: Inspection
steps.description: Joint review to ensure everything meets expectations

occasions.title: When Do We Recommend Deep Cleaning?

items.title: Before/After Moving
items.description: Clean apartment handover/pickup

items.title: Spring Cleaning
items.description: Annual thorough cleaning

items.title: Before Events
items.description: Holidays, family gatherings

items.title: For Allergy Sufferers
items.description: Dust removal, allergen reduction

faq.question: How long does a deep cleaning take?
faq.answer: For an average apartment (50-70 m²), it usually takes 4-6 hours. For larger apartments or heavier contamination, more time may be needed.

faq.question: What should I prepare?
faq.answer: We recommend putting personal items and valuables in a safe place. We bring all necessary cleaning equipment and products.

faq.question: Do I need to be home during cleaning?
faq.answer: Not necessarily. If you trust us, we can pick up a key. Of course, many clients prefer to stay home, which is perfectly fine.
